commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: We have made it to the final contest. Tied at four to four. I didn't think it would come to this. I applaud you for doing so well for such newbies.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hmph. These newbies took four wins from you. I'll show you that the great μ's aren't anything special after all.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Stop it, you two.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: So what are you going to do to contest your idol powers?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: We're going to have a comprehensive contest to test our true idol abilities! Great idea for the final contest, huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: How do we decide who wins?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Idols are watched by many people. In order to test our idol powers, we need lots of people to watch us. So, we're going to stream this contest!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You'll have to do a self-introduction based on the character you get, and viewers will vote on who's better.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So whoever is cuter wins, huh? *Giggle* You thought up a great contest for us.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Our character themes will be pulled out of a box, one by one. Hey, pull for us.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wait, me?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You're not in the competing lineup, so I'm letting you pick as a special favor. Go on, take one.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay...there we go.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Thanks! *Giggle* I'm looking forward to this one.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The stream is about to start. Are you both ready?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yup! I'm ready to go when you are!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'll show you the power of super idol Nico!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You two are really into it. I can't wait to see how this turns out.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, let's start. The ninth contest's live stream...is live!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hello everyone! It's me, your favorite idol Nico! Thanks for watching!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm Kasumin! This is my first stream with μ's Nico! My heart is pounding!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Today, Kasumin and I are practicing our self-introductions. Please let us know who you thought was cuter!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I practiced a lot of different styles, so please watch!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The first theme is "like a little sister." You first, Kasumin. Do your best!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ugh, I got goosebumps. *Cough* Okay, I'll start!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Nice to meet you, I'm Kasumin. I'm good at cooking.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ohmygosh, I actually said it all right! Will you reward me with a pat on the head?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Cooking? It's not a lie, I guess. Her bread rolls are to die for.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: She pulled off that character with ease.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm next. Here I go!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: My name? You should already know my name. Come on, at least remember it!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: All right, listen. My name is...Nico!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: What's so little sister about that?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: U-Uhh... It was tsundere. There are lots of little sisters in the world.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: The little sister character is deep.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The next theme is "rapping"! Sounds hard, right? Gotta do our best though! Kasumin, go for it!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Capturing the world with my art, training steels my heart, my soul is unshakable on stage and my cute face will make your heart rage!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm just a dame with a one way ticket to fame, Kasumin, that's my name! Yeah!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: W-Way to go. I won't let you best me though!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: A super idol living in Japan, the most dazzling idol in the land! Call for it and I have no choice, but to deliver my angelic voice!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Men and women, children and old, no looking away, you must behold! Nico wooo!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: They're both really into it.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Don't you think rapping has a lot of puns? For rhyming and stuff I guess.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Now, onto the next one!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Okay everyone, that was all the styles! We honestly want everyone to watch more, but that's all we have for today. Sorry!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Please choose one of the following four options and vote on who you liked more!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: 1: "Nico" 2: "Kasumin" 3: "Both, I can't decide"! 4: "Both sucked"

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Wait, what? There's a weird option in there.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I got some good advice about including that, but I know none of you will pick it.

commands.speaker: Nico, Kasumi
commands.line: Okay, let the voting begin!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ummm... The result of the ninth contest is...a tie!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Nico got 1%, Kasumi got 1%, 3% chose both, and the rest chose option 4.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I can't say I didn't see that coming.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Whyyyyyyy! I don't get it! Did everyone watching have holes for eyes or something?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Nico, you set this up, didn't you?! I would never get a low rating like 1% otherwise! What have you done?!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Calm down, the both of you. This is the judgment that has been passed down by the viewers. If you want to complain--

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: It's your fault, Umi! I added that choice because you told me to consider all the options!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: What?! You're blaming ME?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Man, this is getting out of control.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: But if it's a tie, what do we do?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Good question.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Right, that means we're still tied in the overall competition.
